channel.title: Does Anyone Know What Happened To HyperPisOff?
channel.description:
I'm just really curious is all. He was co-admin on Autorune I think, and he left before the scam was over. He said he was coming back in a few months, but he never returned to any community, I don't think. He was always on MSN though.
Does anyone know where he went/what happened to him?
Thanks x

item.title: Does Anyone Know What Happened To HyperPisOff?
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:7, topic:43439”][quote author=Krichevskoy link=topic=60452.msg731376#msg731376 date=1167887225]
The AutoRune Crew or The AutoRune Community, depending on which era you’re talking about. Evolved out of Kaitnieks’s ARC (AutoRune Crew) after he sold the rights. Both TARCs have been universally disliked by their own members and other communities due to the high incidences of scamming, DoS wars, “lost” account databases requiring repurchase, embedding account stealing routines in their principal product, and other general nastiness.
High point of membership came when eXemplar cracked AutoRune and people joined to leech scripts.
[/quote]

Ahh I see. If AutoRune didn’t work, then why did TARC bother to buy AutoRune, since Jagex fixed that little bug and duping was no more?[/quote]

Little-known fact: AutoRune was also a bot.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Anyone Know What Happened To HyperPisOff?

The AutoRune Crew or The AutoRune Community, depending on which era you’re talking about. Evolved out of Kaitnieks’s ARC (AutoRune Crew) after he sold the rights. Both TARCs have been universally disliked by their own members and other communities due to the high incidences of scamming, DoS wars, “lost” account databases requiring repurchase, embedding account stealing routines in their principal product, and other general nastiness.
High point of membership came when eXemplar cracked AutoRune and people joined to leech scripts.

item.title: Does Anyone Know What Happened To HyperPisOff?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I hated that guy. I told him that many times, yet he made me a section mod for some damn strange reason.

If you ask me, he was RaW but just an alias. Or wait scratch that, he was one of those old TARC pricks. Those guys were seriously fucked.

Read full topic
